location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, 2 Manor Place, North, Edinburgh to Lewis Pelly

physicalDescription.extent: Condition Imperfect: The top right hand corner of folio sixty-nine has been torn off, and key information including the date and address are no longer visible, as are the first few words of the first line on the verso of the folio.

mods.abstract: Letter informing Pelly that both Mrs Aitchison and Mrs Cox will be accompanying him to London and asking Pelly to dine with them at the Charing Cross Hotel, as well as asking him to meet them there rather than coming to Kings Cross to meet them.
